title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.8 - Snowmobiles; snow travelers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.8 - Snowmobiles; snow travelers

State Regulations

No person shall use snowmobiles or snow travelers on any part
of the authority facilities unless under the direction of an agent or employee
of the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
204.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
